A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Based on most media reviews and coverage\, my low opinion of this movie would make me a bot\, a cry baby fanboy\, someone who cannot accept new things\, or all of the above! I assure you I am one person who seriously DID NOT LIKE THIS MOVIE\, and that is my opinion.\n\nThis movie DID NOT RUIN my childhood\, as a matter of fact\, my childhood was just fine\, so lay off my childhood. I was glad to have seen the Star Wars trilogy\, and even the prequels(they weren't great movies\, in my opinion\, but they are canon). But what it did do is ruin Star Wars\, it's myth and even the movie structure they built over 6 films.
